footerLinks.title: 529 Tax Benefits
footerLinks.content: As of 2026, Georgia taxpayers can receive an state income tax deduction for contributions to a Path2College 529 Plan account up to $4,000 per year. Tax parity states like AZ, AR, KS, ME, MN, MO, MT, OH, PA also offer state income tax benefits. Read J.P. Morgan's 529 State Plan Tax Map to learn more.
